total_budget.name: total_budget
total_budget.label: common/common.total_budget_label
total_budget.hover_text:
Provide your organisation’s total expected development and humanitarian spend for the current and (where possible) following three years. Budgets should preferably be entered for each three month (quarter) period. Budget time periods should not overlap or cover a period of more than twelve months.

Click here for more information

value.name: value
value.label: common/common.legacy_data_attributes_value_label
value.hover_text: The total value of the organisation’s budget for this period.

ref.name: ref
ref.label: common/common.reporting_org_attributes_ref_label
ref.hover_text: You can provide a reference that you use to identify this budget line in your organisation’s financial reporting system.

ref.name: ref
ref.label: common/common.reporting_org_attributes_ref_label
ref.hover_text: You can provide a reference that you use to identify this budget line in your organisation’s financial reporting system.

vocabulary-uri.name: vocabulary_uri
vocabulary-uri.label: common/common.sector_attributes_vocabulary_uri_label
vocabulary-uri.hover_text: If you have selected the vocabulary ‘99 - Reporting Organisation’, provide the URI where this internal list is defined.

ref.name: ref
ref.label: common/common.reporting_org_attributes_ref_label
ref.hover_text: You can provide a reference that you use to identify this budget line in your organisation’s internal financial management system.

recipient_country_budget.name: recipient_country_budget
recipient_country_budget.label: common/common.recipient_country_budget_label
recipient_country_budget.hover_text:
You can provide forward-looking budgets for particular countries that your organisation operates in.

Click here for more information

code.name: code
code.label: elements/org_json_schema.common/common.activity_status_attributes_activity_status_label
code.hover_text: Select the country benefitting from this budget.

ref.name: ref
ref.label: common/common.reporting_org_attributes_ref_label
ref.hover_text: You can provide a reference that you use to identify this budget line in your organisation’s internal financial management system.

total_expenditure.name: total_expenditure
total_expenditure.label: common/common.total_expenditure_label
total_expenditure.hover_text:
You can provide information on your organisation's past spending on humanitarian and development work. This is known as ‘total expenditure’ and IATI recommends, where possible, that your organisation reports its total expenditure for each of the past three years. An expenditure period must not be longer than one year.

Click here for more information

value.name: value
value.label: common/common.legacy_data_attributes_value_label
value.hover_text: The total value of your organisation’s humanitarian and development expenditure for this period.

expense_line.name: expense_line
expense_line.label: elements/org_json_schema.total_expenditure_sub_elements_expense_line_label
expense_line.hover_text: You can provide further information by breaking your organisation’s expenditure down into expense line(s). The sum of expense lines does not have to equal the total value of expenditure.

ref.name: ref
ref.label: common/common.reporting_org_attributes_ref_label
ref.hover_text: You can provide a reference that you use to identify this expense in your organisation’s financial reporting system.

document_link.name: document_link
document_link.label: common/common.document_link_label
document_link.hover_text:
A link to an online, publicly accessible, web page or document. For example, you could provide a link to your organisation’s annual report or a work plan for a particular country. Create additional document elements for each separate document.

Click here for more information
